description: This Java class, EnumDefinition, models enumeration definitions based on an XML input. It encapsulates enumeration values, metadata such as name, description, and native code flags, and provides methods to access these details.

classes.name: EnumDefinition
classes.description: Models an enumeration definition, encapsulating its name, description, native code flags, and a list of enumeration values.

classes.name: EnumValue
classes.description: Inner class representing a single enumeration value, including its string name, numeric value, description, and short name.

methods.name: EnumDefinition(ICEnumDefinition bean)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the EnumDefinition instance based on data from an ICEnumDefinition object.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the enumeration.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Returns the description of the enumeration.

methods.name: doesNativeDefinitionExist
methods.description: Indicates whether a native definition for this enum exists outside this code.

methods.name: generateNativeLabels
methods.description: Flag indicating whether native labels should be generated.

methods.name: generateNativeShortNames
methods.description: Flag indicating whether native short names should be generated.

methods.name: getEnumValues
methods.description: Returns an iterator over the enumeration values.

methods.name: getEnumCount
methods.description: Returns the number of enumeration values.
